website_summaries.verdict: The latest Samsung Gear VR headset lets you experience virtual reality on the Galaxy Note 7, along with most other recent Galaxy smartphones.
cons: Not as visually impressive or technically powerful as PC-based headsets

customer_reviews.title: Sign of the future and cheap way to get a taste.
customer_reviews.text: Bought after being impressed by Google's Cardboard Box that was being handed out for free at a festival. The tech is still in its early days but really shows that the future holds. There are a range of games and video services available through the Oculus store (most are chargeable) and all offer a different experience. For £60 this is a real must have experience for anyone with an S6/S7 and has made me very excited for the more powerful VR systems coming out later in the year.
customer_reviews.author: Ben

customer_reviews.title: Must buy if you own a Samsung phone!!
customer_reviews.text: Bought in the sale and very pleased. Obviously never going to compete with the proper dedicated VR setups but my Samsung Edge 7 goes a long way to make the experience a reality. Love the software (included via download) and very easy to use
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good be head set but now there are better out there. Definitely worth it as it's well priced
customer_reviews.text: Well priced vr headset and although it's a little dated now, the picture is perfect and the only 2 issues i have are 1. The lense steams up when first used and 2. The novelty of vr has subsided for me.
customer_reviews.author: Grammac89

customer_reviews.title: Bargain for a quality vr experience
customer_reviews.text: Thought I'd try this headset out as just recently upgraded to a Samsung S6 and always wanted to experience vr in my own home. Considering the Playstation vr headset is priced at £349 this is an absolute steal. Couldnt actually believe how good it was when first put it on. It even has a vr cinema where you can watch movies and videos stored on your phone. Both picture and sound is amazing. Defo recommend headphones to immerse yourself fully into the experience. My friends and family love it!
customer_reviews.author: Pete 2104

customer_reviews.title: Temperamental with s6!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I received this product a few days before the expected delivery date which was great! But I was having lots of different problems when trying to connect the headset to my samsung s6. I later got it working fine and then I left it for a few hours, went back to plug it in and the headset did not detect that my mobile was connected. I done a bit of research online and noticed a lot of people having the same problems with the samsung s6.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very well made and feels comfortable
customer_reviews.text: I love latest technology and VR is one of the best way to enjoy yourself. Samsung vr is very good I can spend hours playing on it people who worry that there will be pixal in Gear VR well you are right that because of Phone display. But its not that much I mean samsung improved with their displays. May be next year they will announce 4K display on Phones then we will have HD VR experience. For £62 VR and Play with your mind its lots of fun if you know what to do. One thing your Phone will heat up. If you guys love technology then VR is for you guys.
customer_reviews.author: MavicPilot

customer_reviews.title: Excellent. Works well
customer_reviews.text: Excellent. Bought as a Christmas gift for my husband. He loves it. But I came back and then ordered the remote as he said it was easier to play some of the games using a remote rather than the headset itself. Great value for money
customer_reviews.author: Dianne Newman

customer_reviews.title: Great fun and a good way of experiencing virtual reality without spending a fortune
customer_reviews.text: Great fun but they need to improve the ventilation in further models because it can get very sweaty around the eyes if worn for any length of time. You can just about get away with wearing glasses underneath them but you will need to regularly wipe the missed off due to the heat that builds up from the phone and the lack of ventilation
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Walker

customer_reviews.title: Good bit of kit
customer_reviews.text: Definitely worth the money it's a great bit of kit got a good range of games and you can also play the games from the Google play store if you download an app that let's you play cardboard games it's very fun to play the games especially when I get my partner on the scary ones it's a good laugh.
customer_reviews.author: Daniel Sutcliffe

customer_reviews.title: Dissatisfied! Need more demos too
customer_reviews.text: Only works with oculus vr apps not cardboard apps just oculus for which I was very dissatisfied,to get all vr apps you will need 2 sets at least the Google ones are cheap! Also in oculus there are no demos you are expected to pay up to 7 quid for something you have no idea if it's a fully working version as most successful are works in progress,I HOPE!
customer_reviews.author: C+J Polok

customer_reviews.title: Great but...
customer_reviews.text: doesnt fit NOTE phone can not adjust focus which is making it difficult to operate by person with eye sight issues
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Does NOT work with a Note 4...but a quality product.
customer_reviews.text: Does NOT work with a Note 4 without modification. Note 4 supports VR now, but will not physically fit in this headset. You can modify it, but I returned it and will look for other alternatives.
customer_reviews.author: Steve

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic
customer_reviews.text: It's really really good. Delivery was faster than expected and in terms of price it was good. The service was good too. The product was sealed with the manufacture warranty and was brand new and excellent quality. The phone fits perfectly inside all the controls work really well overall a good product
customer_reviews.author: Hamzavally

customer_reviews.title: Great buy at good price.
customer_reviews.text: Love this. Had a little try on my Samsung s6 edge. Think I'll have to get the remote. Also not sure how to adjust focus yet but I only had a quick try. Will delve further into it when my daughter has opened it on Christmas morning.
customer_reviews.author: Ashton Arrowsmith

customer_reviews.title: It was a cool experience but it isn't what it's hyped up to ...
customer_reviews.text: It was a cool experience but it isn't what it's hyped up to be. Something I found interesting is that they use the same VR headset at alton towers "galactica". It isn't the same without the ride experience though. I wouldn't recommend it as it isn't very convenient either.
customer_reviews.author: Jack F.

customer_reviews.title: Soooo cool.
customer_reviews.text: Soooo cool. Feels like you are in the action- felt sick watching the roller coaster ride! The way forward in gaming I've no doubt. Good value for money.
customer_reviews.author: Nia

customer_reviews.title: The viewing glass gets steamed up every now and again ...
customer_reviews.text: The viewing glass gets steamed up every now and again during use. The tracker pad is a bit fiddlely to use and over sensitive. The white plastic on the inside reflects light and sometimes takes your out of the virtual environment.
customer_reviews.author: Joxer Singh

customer_reviews.title: Great value as well known stores are selling these for ...
customer_reviews.text: Great value as well known stores are selling these for upwards of £80. Bargain price, great delivery and really great product! These are definitely a low cost way of having a first virtual reality experience before splashing out on more expensive kit
customer_reviews.author: Popsicles

customer_reviews.title: It's amazing and a bargain
customer_reviews.text: When a bought this I didn't realise the future was already here. It's amazing and a bargain.
customer_reviews.author: The Tennis Boy

customer_reviews.title: It's a great idea and fun for the first few minutes
customer_reviews.text: It's a great idea and fun for the first few minutes, but these are heavy to wear, the phone overheats and the resolution is poor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn't waste your money unless you're really into
customer_reviews.text: Too blurry and not enough content. Wouldn't waste your money unless you're really into VR
customer_reviews.author: Jordan

customer_reviews.title: Worth a buy
customer_reviews.text: Everything seems so real. I brought this for my boyfriend it has lots of things to download from kids games to horror games to movies and more and the picture quality is perfect , defo worth a buy !
customer_reviews.author: Jayde

customer_reviews.title: This is Great, A must have if you own a samsung ...
customer_reviews.text: This is Great, A must have if you own a samsung Galaxy 4 or above. I was looking into the PS4 vr headset , then i found the Gear VR for this price wow! My whole family cant stop taking turns, it really does trick the mind in to being in your Vr Surroundings, the note i use has a quad hd display so this carries over onto the Vr Headset and looks incredible. I did have an issue with overheating Galaxy until i bought a usb fan and stuck that to the case perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Mr C.

customer_reviews.title: Pleased I got it because I was thinking of psvr ...
customer_reviews.text: It's okay if you want to get a rough idea what vr is about. Pleased I got it because I was thinking of psvr and thanks to this I've changed my mind.
customer_reviews.author: welly

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Needs more incorporation to games etc but is really cool. Maybe for about 40 quid though not 80.
customer_reviews.author: SK Jordan

customer_reviews.title: It's a lot of fun 2 use would recommend KevenAnna Sminiker Android Wireless Bluetooth ...
customer_reviews.text: It's a lot of fun 2 use would recommend KevenAnna Sminiker Android Wireless Bluetooth Gamepad Game Controller for it also.
customer_reviews.author: Andrew Smith

customer_reviews.title: Worth every penny and more
customer_reviews.text: Really good for the price and depending on the apps you download the quality is fantastic, it deserves 5 stars without question however just be wary of how hot your phone gets when using it, I use an S6 with it and it heats up quite quickly, other than that its a great product!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Ground floor VR well worth a look!.
customer_reviews.text: Excellent product,wasn't expecting it to be very good but i was mistaken,not exactly floods of software available yet but there are certainly some diamonds out there,the night cafe and Affected the manor being two of the best so far,sadly I'm let down by a poor broadband connection so I'm not able to sample any of the livestream stuff but the future of VR looks very exciting!
customer_reviews.author: Mr M.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome!!!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome product the future is nearly here.worth every penny! I got this for £50 and took it to show my Mum and now she's ordered one too 10 out of 10
customer_reviews.author: John f.

customer_reviews.title: a lot better than expected actually
customer_reviews.text: Works really well, a lot better than expected actually. Very immersive experience. There really isn't a lot of content yet though unless you don't mind paying for it.
customer_reviews.author: MikesG7

customer_reviews.title: Be aware- Not  suitable for glasses wearers
customer_reviews.text: Not so good if you wear glasses as the resolution cannot be defined sufficiently and cannot wear glasses when using it. Unfortunately this was not made clear before purchase so disappointed that had to return as was a gift.
customer_reviews.author: Kit C

customer_reviews.title: Really bad.
customer_reviews.text: Can see all the pixels 9n screen. Gets really sweaty and lenses steam up every 5 mins.
customer_reviews.author: Steven123

customer_reviews.title: Good but no so...
customer_reviews.text: This is my second VR I have for my Samsung now and quite frankly I belive they are an amazing piece of equipment. The idea that you can visit a whole other world through a simple pair of goggles and your phone! Exceptional! However this pair I gave to a friend and there is a misty glare in the left eye which is very off putting. Despite that I would still recommend to anyone!
customer_reviews.author: George the Giant

customer_reviews.title: Really great fun.
customer_reviews.text: This is really grat fun to use, fits the s7, s7 edge and other samsung phones.
customer_reviews.author: Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Surprising
customer_reviews.text: I was very surprised when this showed up at my door as I didn't actually complete the order on amazon. I had only looked at the product and put it in my basket. Nevertheless I had to have a look at it when it arrived and it's fantastic so far. Still has a long way to go in terms of apps etc.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: This is a fantastic device, the experience can leave you a tad ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a fantastic device, the experience can leave you a tad dizzy but I recommend it to anyone who wants to try VR without a sky high cost.
customer_reviews.author: Robbie Jardine

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: My husband loves his so much he takes them to work
customer_reviews.author: Nettie1261

customer_reviews.title: Technology not ready
customer_reviews.text: VR as a technology has not reached its peak. Unfortunately after fee minutes it gets uncomfortable
customer_reviews.author: Hen

customer_reviews.title: Poor lenses
customer_reviews.text: Works ok with S7e but the lenses are poor quality with more distortions than a cheap £25 VR headset I previously bought. Plus the lenses are not coated so you see reflections from images on the front of the lens.
customer_reviews.author: juno-first

customer_reviews.title: Wont be dissapointed!
customer_reviews.text: Great fun to play and brilliant quality with a outstandingly good fit couldn't recommend enough definitely worth paying the extra for the official product!
customer_reviews.author: Richard

customer_reviews.title: Resolution is not great but this is more down to making a phone's ...
customer_reviews.text: Resolution is not great but this is more down to making a phone's resolution fill your view. Would recommend as their are some really good games and videos out. However many of the games aren't free.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome, relatively cheap dip into the world of VR
customer_reviews.text: For the cost (assuming you have the phone) this gives you a great step into the world of VR (and its even made by Occulus)
customer_reviews.author: Mr. M. E. Leach

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant Vr, it is so much better if you ...
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant Vr, it is so much better if you modify it by using a black indelible marker to black out the inner white plastic, the white causes a light glare from the sreen lighting which is distracting once you get past the new wonder factor.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Happy dad !
customer_reviews.text: Got this for my Dad for Christmas and he is really pleased with it. I felt the price was good too
customer_reviews.author: Michelle Warnock

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Good product fun technology don't actually use it much impulse purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Phil W.

customer_reviews.title: Nearly real
customer_reviews.text: Excellent piece of equipment every who has used think what they see is awesome. Good price too
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: even upgraded my phone to get the best from the unit
customer_reviews.text: Superb piece of equipment, even upgraded my phone to get the best from the unit!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Would be 5 stars if there was a ventilation built ...
customer_reviews.text: Would be 5 stars if there was a ventilation built it to prevent fogging of the lenses on a warm day.
customer_reviews.author: PL

customer_reviews.title: Realy good fun
customer_reviews.text: This is one of the most entertaining things I've ever bought. The only problem is I've had to keep fighting my kids off of it so I can have a go.
customer_reviews.author: Paul mason

customer_reviews.title: Samsung gear vr
customer_reviews.text: Amazing is all i can say after just 5 hours i am using samsung galaxy s7 edge with gear vr words can't do it justice and for £59 wow
customer_reviews.author: Mr. P. C. Mcgurty

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: Amazing. Absolutely incredible. What a thing to have in your own home...!
customer_reviews.author: KesJan

customer_reviews.title: It's alright...
customer_reviews.text: Bit of a gimmick and a novelty item... Will get more use in future though.

customer_reviews.title: Definitly worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Works perfectly and is great as an introduction into the vr world!
customer_reviews.author: Cah

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Love it, updates keep on coming a must have if you have the phone
customer_reviews.author: emma butters

customer_reviews.title: Amazing
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely amazing. Fits great. Looks great. Just all round amazing. I love it (when I can get the kids off it)

customer_reviews.title: Good.
customer_reviews.text: Very good, just need to find a way to fix my device overheat problem.
customer_reviews.author: B

customer_reviews.title: Ought to have been designed to work with Note 4
customer_reviews.text: It's a shame it's not designed for the Note 4 but I manages to cut away at the plastic with a knife and use a hot soldering iron to melt a channel for the headphone jack. Now it works with my Note 4 :)
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Good introduction to VR until I save up for a PS VR!
customer_reviews.author: Mr Chris Moss

customer_reviews.title: Brilliant!
customer_reviews.text: Fantastic piece of kit, didn't expect much with it running purely of a phone, but wow. If you want to experience VR without spending £700+ on the vive, gear vr is the way to go! They just need to release some more games
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great item
customer_reviews.text: Great item and was brand new much better than I expected
customer_reviews.author: Arvinderpal Sidhu

customer_reviews.title: Awesome gift!
customer_reviews.text: Amazing! Lots of brownie points from this gift to my boyfriend who totally forgot about me after receiving this present. He loved it and honestly became like a kid with his amazing new toy!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: LACK OF GAMES
customer_reviews.text: The device its self is really fun and brings the best out of mobile gaming its just a shame on the lack of games and different genres that are available which is a shame and is the reason I dont play with it that much but as time goes on it will be better.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Great way to get into VR with a samsung phone.

customer_reviews.title: Husband loves it
customer_reviews.text: Apparently this is the best gift I've ever bought my husband lol, he absolutely loves it would highly recommend
customer_reviews.author: Tracy Mcmillan

customer_reviews.title: Top product
customer_reviews.text: It's a must have for any Samsung owner, don't know why I didn't buy one earlier, it's an amazing experience, a bit strange at first. I suggest sitting down first, before first time use.
customer_reviews.author: phil mortimer

customer_reviews.title: Out of this world
customer_reviews.text: Amazing technology, completely immersive and works flawlessly with my Samsung S7 edge. My lifelong dream was to experience full immersive VR and Samsung have made my dreams a reality
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality product i love it fits for my s7 ...
customer_reviews.text: Very good quality product i love it fits for my s7 edge perfectly i love it. shipment so good it arrived form edynburgh to poland in one day on 17th even tho amazon said it will be on 18th so thats nice

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brilliant. Just buy it and get ready for the ride.

customer_reviews.title: Great for 3d movies and photos and I love the ...
customer_reviews.text: Great for 3d movies and photos and I love the Streetvuew app. Would have been 5 stars but they need to solve the problem of the viewer misting up

customer_reviews.title: A Bargain

customer_reviews.title: I didn't expect VR to be this good.
customer_reviews.text: This is a much cheaper way to experience VR if you aready have a galaxy phone and not sure about it. PS VR, HTC Vine, and Oculus Rift will cost much more.

customer_reviews.title: great item, far better value than a bricks and ...
customer_reviews.text: Quick shipping, great item, far better value than a bricks and mortar store.

customer_reviews.title: they were delighted with it

customer_reviews.text: Arrived precisely on time. Product is excellent. I recommend downloading the free game "Face your fears", it's very impressive.

customer_reviews.text: If you have a Samsung phone and any interest at all in VR then it's a no brainer, was not expecting much and was blown away.

customer_reviews.author: Bombcake

customer_reviews.title: Good low cost VR solution that's portable, lightweight and easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: +Good product overall. +Amazing to see for the first time. +Low cost gateway into the world of VR. +Portable +Comfortable. +Easy to setup and use. +Plenty of VR Apps to try out. +Stylish for a VR Headset. -Current mobile screen tech has too low a resolution for VR. Not the Headsets fault though. -Screen door effect. -Buttons can be a be fiddly to use. -Dust on the lens can be annoying. -Condensation can be a problem sometimes.
customer_reviews.author: Jay H

customer_reviews.title: Better then expected.
customer_reviews.text: If you have a compatible phone then I would recommend buying this. It's a great start to the VR world. Don't listen to the naysayers comparing this to the Rift or HTC Vive, it's a ridiculous comparison, they both need a hefty pc and power to operate.
customer_reviews.author: Martin Ross

customer_reviews.title: Amazing!
customer_reviews.text: After getting a new s6, I thought why not jump into VR and it's been one hell of an experience! It's built well, easy to use too. Only concern is that your phone will heat up so short bursts of play are best. Worth getting a case too, lens need to be crystal clear and to not get damaged by sunlight when idle. Other than that it's comfortable to wear for a limited period and Samsung's App support is great too.
customer_reviews.author: Manny.S

product_meta.title: Samsung Gear VR Virtual Reality Headset (UK Specification - SM-R322NZWABTU) - Frosted White
product_meta.description:
Enjoy 2D/3D Contents, play VR games, explore tourist attractions virtually with an immersive 360-degree panoramic view. Experience Gear VR now

- Gear VR requires the Samsung Galaxy Note5, S6 edge+, S6 or S6 edge.

- Gear VR cannot be operated by itself.

- Download VR apps from Oculus Store.

For more information on your device, please visit the Samsung website

Please note this is the United Kingdom (UK) version and is being shipped from the UK.

EAN: 8806088150208
feature_bullets: Compatible with the Samsung Galaxy Note5, S6 edge+, S6 or S6 edge

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.3 out of 5 stars496 ratings4.3 out of 5 stars
